text: Mollem is a small village in Goa, South India on National Highway 4 near the border with Karnataka in the foothills of the Sahyadri Mountain range at the beginning of Anmod Ghat. It comes under the Sanguem block.Rural Housing Report for Financial year 2010-2011 It is the primary entry point for Bhagwan Mahaveer Sanctuary and Mollem National Park. ==Geology== Some of the world's oldest rocks are found in this region and are classified as Trondjemeitic Gneiss with Rubidium isotope dating estimating them to be at least 3,600 Billion years old. == References == Category:Villages in South Goa district
title: Molem
